commit message: Issue #9: WIP to load themes locally instead of from a server
No longer copy sounds to the sdcard
Now we only need the sdcard to save animations
Correction of the theme loading progress bar
Show the default image instead of a blank screen, at the beginning of loading themes
Moved AssetStreamLoader to its own file.
Use newer SoundPool API if available
Some android code inspection issues.  Split string files.
Hard-code the list of themes in the preference screen.
Add logging, and set the sound loading thread to low priority
